text: The 2022 AFC Women's Asian Cup qualification will be the qualification tournament for the 2022 AFC Women's Asian Cup. A total of an unknown number of teams will enter the qualification tournament, which decides a certain number out of the twelve participating teams in the final tournament to be held in India. This tournament will also serve as the first stage of Asian qualification for the 2023 FIFA Women's World Cup, with the yet-to-be- determined number of teams of the Women's Asian Cup qualifying for the World Cup. ==Draw== India might not participate in this tournament since they have already qualified as hosts for the 2022 AFC Women's Asian Cup. {| class="wikitable" |- !width=25%| Pot 1 !width=25%| Pot 2 !width=25%| Pot 3 !width=25%| Pot 4 !width=25%| Pot 5 |- | (7) (10) (11) (15) (18) (35) | (39) (40) (42) (45) (58) (67) | (70) (74) (82) (84) (90) (94) | (97) (99) (117) (120) (123) (128) | (132) (134) (140) (141) (142) (154) |- !colspan=2|Unranked teams |- |colspan=2 valign=top| |- |} The pots are yet to be finalised. The current arrangement is based upon the latest FIFA rankings as of 14 August 2020. ==Qualified teams== The following 12 teams qualified for the final tournament. {| class="wikitable sortable" |- ! Team ! Qualified as ! Qualified on ! data-sort-type="number"|Previous appearances in AFC Women's Asian Cup1 |- | || || || 8 (1979, 1981, 1983, 1995, 1997, 1999, 2001, 2003) |} : 1 Bold indicates champions for that year. Italic indicates hosts for that year. ==References== ==External links== *, the-AFC.com *AFC Women's Asian Cup 2022 Competition Regulations Qualification Category:AFC Women's Asian Cup qualification Women's Asian Cup qualification AFC Women's Asian Cup qualification AFC Women's Asian Cup qualification
title: 2022 AFC Women's Asian Cup qualification
